oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Record of D Bleek's visit to the Hadza of Tanganyika, 1930. Words and sentences with very fragmented narratives towards the latter half of the book. Also some names and descriptions of personal history and of the region, and comments about things that Bushmen do (such as taking a wife, and burial) and eat, especially according to the seasons; some fragments of what seem to be myths. Loose inserts, words and maps.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dorothea Bleek
Book BC151_A3_027
